system:
note description: "Base class for all widgets.%NFacilities for geometry management and user input." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "widget, component, control" date: "$Date: 2016-09-27 08:50:48 -0700 (Tue, 27 Sep 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 99192 $"
deferred class ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET
inherit ../interface/ev_pick_and_dropable.xmlEV_PICK_AND_DROPABLE redefine ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
../interface/ev_dockable_source.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE redefine ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
../interface/ev_sensitive.xmlEV_SENSITIVE undefine ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_initializeinitialize redefine ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
../interface/ev_colorizable.xmlEV_COLORIZABLE undefine ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_initializeinitialize redefine ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
../interface/ev_widget_action_sequences.xmlEV_WIDGET_ACTION_SEQUENCES
../interface/ev_help_contextable.xmlEV_HELP_CONTEXTABLE redefine ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
feature -- Basic operations
f_refresh_now../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_refresh_nowrefresh_now -- Force an immediate redraw of Current. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_refresh_nowrefresh_now end
feature -- Access
f_parent../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent: detachable ../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER -- Contains Current. do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_parentparent ensure then bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_parentparent end
f_pointer_position../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_pointer_positionpointer_position: ../interface/ev_coordinate.xmlEV_COORDINATE -- Position of the screen pointer relative to Current. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed is_show_requested: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_show_requestedis_show_requested do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_pointer_positionpointer_position end
f_pointer_style../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_pointer_stylepointer_style: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Cursor displayed when pointer is over this widget. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_internal_pointer_styleinternal_pointer_style end
f_actual_drop_target_agent../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_actual_drop_target_agentactual_drop_target_agent: detachable FalseFUNCTION [FalseINTEGER_32, FalseINTEGER_32, detachable ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xmlEV_ABSTRACT_PICK_AND_DROPABLE] -- Overrides default drop target on a certain position. -- If Void, Current will use the default drop target. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_actual_drop_target_agentactual_drop_target_agent ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_actual_drop_target_agentactual_drop_target_agent end
f_real_target../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_real_targetreal_target: detachable ../interface/ev_dockable_target.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_TARGET -- Result is target used during a dockable transport if -- mouse pointer is above Current. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_real_targetreal_target ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_real_targetreal_target end
f_default_key_processing_handler../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_default_key_processing_handlerdefault_key_processing_handler: detachable FalsePREDICATE [../interface/ev_key.xmlEV_KEY] assign ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_default_key_processing_handlerset_default_key_processing_handler -- Agent used to determine whether the default key processing should occur for Current. -- If agent returns True then default key processing continues as normal, False prevents -- default key processing from occurring. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_default_key_processing_handlerdefault_key_processing_handler ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_default_key_processing_handlerdefault_key_processing_handler end
feature {FalseEV_BUILDER} -- Access
f_minimum_width_set_by_user../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_width_set_by_userminimum_width_set_by_user: FalseBOOLEAN -- Has ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_minimum_widthset_minimum_width been called by the user?
f_minimum_height_set_by_user../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_height_set_by_userminimum_height_set_by_user: FalseBOOLEAN -- Has ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_minimum_heightset_minimum_height been called by the user?
feature -- Status report
f_is_show_requested../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_show_requestedis_show_requested: FalseBOOLEAN -- Will Current be displayed when its parent is? -- See also ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_displayedis_displayed. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_is_show_requestedis_show_requested ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_is_show_requestedis_show_requested end
f_is_displayed../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_displayedis_displayed: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current visible on the screen? -- True when show requested and parent displayed. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_is_displayedis_displayed ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_is_displayedis_displayed end
f_has_focus../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_has_focushas_focus: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does widget have the keyboard focus? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_has_focushas_focus ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_has_focushas_focus end
f_has_capture../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_has_capturehas_capture: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does widget have capture? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_has_capturehas_capture ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_has_capturehas_capture end
feature -- Status setting
f_hide../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_hidehide -- Request that Current not be displayed even when its parent is. -- If successful, make ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_show_requestedis_show_requested False. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_hidehide end
f_show../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_showshow -- Request that Current be displayed when its parent is. -- True by default. -- If successful, make ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_show_requestedis_show_requested True. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_showshow end
f_set_focus../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_focusset_focus -- Grab keyboard focus if ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_displayedis_displayed. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed is_sensitive: ../interface/ev_sensitive.xml#f_is_sensitiveis_sensitive do if ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_displayedis_displayed then ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_set_focusset_focus end end
f_enable_capture../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_enable_captureenable_capture -- Grab all user input events (mouse and keyboard). -- ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_disable_capturedisable_capture must be called to resume normal input handling. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed is_displayed: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_displayedis_displayed do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_enable_captureenable_capture ensure has_capture: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_has_capturehas_capture end
f_disable_capture../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_disable_capturedisable_capture -- Disable grab of all user input events. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_disable_capturedisable_capture ensure not_has_capture: not ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_has_capturehas_capture end
f_center_pointer../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_center_pointercenter_pointer -- Position screen pointer over center of Current. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do (create {../interface/ev_screen.xmlEV_SCREEN}).../interface/ev_screen.xml#f_set_pointer_positionset_pointer_position (../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_screen_xscreen_x + (../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth // 2), ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_screen_yscreen_y + (../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight // 2)) end
f_set_actual_drop_target_agent../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_actual_drop_target_agentset_actual_drop_target_agent (an_agent: like ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_actual_drop_target_agentactual_drop_target_agent) -- Assign an_agent to ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_actual_drop_target_agentactual_drop_target_agent. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed an_agent_not_void: an_agent /= Void do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_set_actual_drop_target_agentset_actual_drop_target_agent (an_agent) ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_actual_drop_target_agentactual_drop_target_agent = an_agent end
f_set_real_target../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_real_targetset_real_target (a_target: ../interface/ev_dockable_target.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_TARGET) -- Assign a_target to ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_real_targetreal_target. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed target_not_void: a_target /= Void do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_set_real_targetset_real_target (a_target) ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_real_targetreal_target = a_target end
f_remove_real_target../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_remove_real_targetremove_real_target -- Ensure ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_real_targetreal_target is Void. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_remove_real_targetremove_real_target ensure real_target_void: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_real_targetreal_target = Void end
f_set_default_key_processing_handler../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_default_key_processing_handlerset_default_key_processing_handler (a_handler: like ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_default_key_processing_handlerdefault_key_processing_handler) -- Assign ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_default_key_processing_handlerdefault_key_processing_handler to a_handler. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_set_default_key_processing_handlerset_default_key_processing_handler (a_handler) end
f_remove_default_key_processing_handler../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_remove_default_key_processing_handlerremove_default_key_processing_handler -- Ensure ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_default_key_processing_handlerdefault_key_processing_handler is Void. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_remove_default_key_processing_handlerremove_default_key_processing_handler end
feature -- Element change
f_set_pointer_style../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_pointer_styleset_pointer_style (a_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE) -- Assign a_cursor to ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_pointer_stylepointer_style. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_cursor_not_void: a_cursor /= Void do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_set_pointer_styleset_pointer_style (a_cursor) ensure pointer_style_assigned: attached ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_pointer_stylepointer_style as l_pointer_style and then l_pointer_style.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (a_cursor) end
f_set_minimum_width../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_minimum_widthset_minimum_width (a_minimum_width: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign a_minimum_width in pixels to ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width. -- If ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth is less than a_minimum_width, resize. -- From now, ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width is fixed and will not be changed -- dynamically by the application anymore. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_minimum_width_positive: a_minimum_width >= 0 do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_set_minimum_widthset_minimum_width (a_minimum_width) ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_width_set_by_userminimum_width_set_by_user := True ensure minimum_width_assigned: (a_minimum_width > 0 implies ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width = a_minimum_width) or (a_minimum_width = 0 implies (../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width <= 1)) minimum_width_set_by_user_set: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_width_set_by_userminimum_width_set_by_user end
f_set_minimum_height../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_minimum_heightset_minimum_height (a_minimum_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set a_minimum_height in pixels to ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height. -- If ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight is less than a_minimum_height, resize. -- From now, ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height is fixed and will not be changed -- dynamically by the application anymore. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_minimum_height_positive: a_minimum_height >= 0 do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_set_minimum_heightset_minimum_height (a_minimum_height) ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_height_set_by_userminimum_height_set_by_user := True ensure minimum_height_assigned: (a_minimum_height > 0 implies ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height = a_minimum_height) or (a_minimum_height = 0 implies (../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height <= 1)) minimum_height_set_by_user_set: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_height_set_by_userminimum_height_set_by_user end
f_set_minimum_size../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_set_minimum_sizeset_minimum_size (a_minimum_width, a_minimum_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign a_minimum_height to ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height -- and a_minimum_width to ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width in pixels. -- If ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth or ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight is less than minimum size, resize. -- From now, minimum size is fixed and will not be changed -- dynamically by the application anymore. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_minimum_width_positive: a_minimum_width >= 0 a_minimum_height_positive: a_minimum_height >= 0 do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xml#f_set_minimum_sizeset_minimum_size (a_minimum_width, a_minimum_height) ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_height_set_by_userminimum_height_set_by_user := True ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_width_set_by_userminimum_width_set_by_user := True ensure minimum_width_assigned: (a_minimum_width > 0 implies ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width = a_minimum_width) or (a_minimum_width = 0 implies (../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width <= 1)) minimum_height_assigned: (a_minimum_height > 0 implies ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height = a_minimum_height) or (a_minimum_height = 0 implies (../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height <= 1)) minimum_height_set_by_user_set: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_height_set_by_userminimum_height_set_by_user minimum_width_set_by_user_set: ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_width_set_by_userminimum_width_set_by_user end
feature {FalseEV_BUILDER} -- Element change
f_reset_minimum_width../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_reset_minimum_widthreset_minimum_width -- Reset ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_width_set_by_userminimum_width_set_by_user. do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_width_set_by_userminimum_width_set_by_user := False ensure minimum_width_set_by_user_reset: not ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_width_set_by_userminimum_width_set_by_user end
f_reset_minimum_height../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_reset_minimum_heightreset_minimum_height -- Reset ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_height_set_by_userminimum_height_set_by_user. do ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_height_set_by_userminimum_height_set_by_user := False ensure minimum_height_set_by_user_reset: not ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_minimum_height_set_by_userminimum_height_set_by_user end
feature {NONE} -- Contract support
f_is_in_default_state../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in its default state? do Result := ../interface/ev_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_pick_and_dropable.xmlEV_PICK_AND_DROPABLE} and ../interface/ev_sensitive.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_sensitive.xmlEV_SENSITIVE} and ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_colorizable.xmlEV_COLORIZABLE} and ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_help_contextable.xmlEV_HELP_CONTEXTABLE} and ../interface/ev_dockable_source.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_dockable_source.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE} end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_widget_i.xmlEV_WIDGET_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit. -- See {EV_ANY}.implementation.
invariant is_displayed_implies_show_requested: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable and then ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_displayedis_displayed implies ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_show_requestedis_show_requested parent_contains_current: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable and then attached ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent as l_parent implies l_parent.Falsehas (Current)

end -- class ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET
